entry.title: BRAVO Men Boot MARTEN-4 Casual Winter Fur Boot - Waterproof Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: BRAVO
Type: Men Casual Winter Fur Boot
Price: 45.00

  • Bring on the Cold Weather and Stay Stylishly Prepared with these Classic Comfort Bravo! Chelsea Fur Lined Boots Designed in Toronto, Canada by Vangelo.
  • Premium Waterproof Faux Leather Upper with Tonal Stitching at a Plain Round Toe Ankle Boot Silhouette. Seam-Sealed Waterproof Membrane Construction Keep Feet Dry and Protected from Wet Elements.
  • Heavy 600g Warm Insulate Faux Fur Lining for an Excellent Interior Warmth and Protection from Cold, and Fur Covered Insole Wrap Your Feet to Provide All-Day Support and Comfort in Cold Weather As Low As -24째C / -11째F.
  • Convenient Double Side Zipper Closure for Easy On-And-Off Wear.
  • Durable Rubber Outsole with Slip Resistant Lug Pattern for Maximum Traction. Heel Measures Approximately 1". Size 9 Shaft Height measures approximately 4.5" From Arch, and Size 9 Circumference measures Approximately 11". Please Note that Measurements May Vary by Different Sizes. Perfect for Daily Wear in the Winter Season.
